Constructor Detail

Hermes

public Hermes()
Primary constructor of any class which inherit from Hermes Actions : - infer table name - load attributes - call Associations constructor - call Validations constructor

Method Detail

save

public boolean save()
Save object in database if and only if no validation fail

Returns:
True if object is saved.False if error occured

saveWithoutValidation

public boolean saveWithoutValidation()
Save object in database without calling validations

Returns:
True if object is saved.False if error occured

delete

public boolean delete()
Delete object in database. Object have now his id set to 0.

Returns:
True if deleted, else False.

delete

public static boolean delete(java.lang.String conditions,
                             java.lang.Class<? extends Hermes> model)
Delete objects of a class from database with conditions

Parameters:
conditions - : conditions on record(s) to delete
model - : Class extending Hermes of the objects to delete.
Returns:
True if all deleted, else False. 
 Example 
 
 Hermes.delete("name = 'anonymous' and address.street='rue de Brest'",Person.class)
 /code>

conditions - : string of conditions where attributes associations can be used.
model -
options -
Returns:
Set of founded objects 
 Example 
 
 find("name,age","name='Job' and pets.name='Medor'",Person.class,"order => 'name desc'")

validatePresenceOf

public void validatePresenceOf(java.lang.String attribute,
                               java.lang.String message)
"Presence of" validator. Object is not saved if attribute has null value. A personalized error message can be used if validation fails.

Parameters:
attribute - : attribute name
message - : Message of error(Error class) if validation fails.

validateSizeOf

public void validateSizeOf(java.lang.String attribute,
                           int min,
                           int max,
                           boolean allowNull)
"Size of" validator. Validate the size of the given attribute between min and max. Validation is skipped if allowNull is true and the attribute value is null.

Parameters:
attribute - : Attribute name
min - : Min size
max - : Max size
allowNull - : Allow null or no

validateSizeOf

public void validateSizeOf(java.lang.String attribute,
                           int min,
                           int max,
                           boolean allowNull,
                           java.lang.String message)
"Size of" validator. Validate the size of the given attribute between min and max. Validation is skipped if allowNull is true and the attribute value is null. A personalized error message can be used if validation fails.

Parameters:
attribute - : Attribute name
min - : Min size
max - : Max size
allowNull - : Allow null or no
message - : Message of error(Error class) if validation fails.
